Projects About Resume

Projects

Built With

This is a rendition of the classic game Battleship, with extra functionality inspired by the Steam version. Inspired by retro style arcade games and Made entirely in vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript, it showcases my ability to make and consistently improve complex web apps.

This project was a challenge initially as the functionality was rather complicated compared to what I was used to. I learned git more in-depth to effectively manage adding new features.

Built With

Punk themed shopping cart made with React.js. It's one of my first ever React projects utilizing React Router, UI Testing via Jest, and some assets that I made myself.

During this project I learned about Responsive Design, and this was my first project that I designed with mobile first design principles in mind.
